thumb.name: Magic of Christmas Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: Add your own personal touch to any Christmas tree %26#150; by creating a unique ornament that features up to four different favourite photos!%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/B%3E A4 Paper. Preferably heavy cardstock. Scissors. Tape or glue. Wire ornament hanger or ribbon.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EMake%3C/b%3E text changes as desired and %3Cb%3Einsert%3C/b%3E photos.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint%3C/b%3E to send finished %3Cb%3EOrnament%3C/b%3E to the printer.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/B%3E along solid lines.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3ETo form hanger on top of ornament. %3Cb%3Ecut%3C/b%3E along solid white line.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPunch%3C/b%3E hole in hanger.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EFold%3C/b%3E along all dashed lines, printed side out to form a box.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EInsert%3C/b%3E tabs and secure with glue or tape to finish your ornament.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EThread%3C/b%3E ribbon through hole to finish the %3Cb%3EAdd-a-Photo Ornament.%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIf you do not have digital photos available to use for the ornament %26#150; you can cut out the white Add-a-Photo blocks and glue or tape a photo to the inside of the ornament.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMakes a great personalised package decoration.

thumb.name: Holly and Ribbon
thumb.verse: Bows add a certain simple elegance to any Christmas tree and can also be used to fill in open areas on especially large trees.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EYou'll need:%3C/B%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E A4 Paper. Preferably heavy cardstock. Scissors. Tape or glue.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CB%3EDirections:%3C/B%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3COL%3E%3CLI%3EClick on %3CB%3EPersonalise and Print Your Project%3C/B%3E to open the Creative workspace. %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3EClick %3Cb%3EPrint%3C/b%3E to send finished Bow to the printer.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut%3C/b%3E along all solid lines.%3CBR%3E%3CBR%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EMake%3C/b%3E a large loop using the Bow section, printed side out. %3Cb%3ESecure%3C/b%3E with tape or glue.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ECut out%3C/b%3E hanging tab on Bow Center. Use solid white line as the guide.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EPunch%3C/b%3E hole in hanging tab.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ELoop%3C/b%3E Bow Center around the large Bow section. Secure with tape or glue.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EAttach%3C/b%3E Ribbons to the back of the Bow. %3Cb%3ESecure%3C/b%3E with tape or glue.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3ETape or glue%3C/b%3E Holly Leaves to finish Bow.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3CLI%3E%3Cb%3EThread%3C/b%3E ribbon through the hanging tab.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3C/LI%3E%3C/OL%3E%3CB%3ETips:%3C/B%3E %3CBR%3E%3CBR%3EPrint your project on scrap paper first to check the alignment, spelling and overall look of the project. %3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ETo personalise the Bow %26#150; add a name and date to the ribbons by adding a text box within the creative workspace.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor extra glimmer add a fine layer of glitter as highlights.
